summary: The diff implements a comprehensive premium redesign covering most of the requirements: Lucide icons replacing emojis (REQ-13), multi-accent colour palette with CSS custom properties and Tailwind tokens (REQ-14), glassmorphism card design (REQ-15), premium Hero section (REQ-16), upgraded Navbar (REQ-17), improved typography/spacing (REQ-18), Mess Menu redesign with accent colours and Lucide icons (REQ-19), and Quick Access tile redesign with gradient icon containers (REQ-20). Almost all acceptance criteria appear to be met, with one notable gap around the Navbar dropdown teal accent bars which are referenced via a CSS class but not fully confirmed in truncated output.

missing_requirements.requirement: Dropdown nav links should have left-side teal accent bars on hover
missing_requirements.reason: The Navbar.tsx applies class 'nav-link-hover' to mobile dropdown links and the index.css summary mentions nav-link hover effects, but the actual CSS rule defining the left-side teal bar is in the truncated portion of index.css and cannot be confirmed. Desktop nav links use only inline colour change handlers with no visible left-side bar implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Subtle grid overlay added to Hero section using CSS linear-gradient grid lines
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies only ambient glow orbs for the Hero background decoration. A grid line overlay pattern was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Feature tag chips row (Timetable, Mess Menu, Events, Notices, Library) added to Hero section
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies a premium badge/pill subtitle and gradient heading for the Hero but does not request a separate row of feature tag chips below the subtitle.

hallucinated_features.description: Dual CTA buttons and scroll indicator arrow added to Hero section
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention CTA buttons or a scroll indicator in the Hero section requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer component redesigned with gradient logo, GraduationCap icon, Heart icon, and caffeine.ai attribution styling
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request lists specific sections to redesign (Quick Access, Mess Menu, Events, Notices, Navbar, BottomPanel, Modal, Hero) and explicitly states non-goals include adding new sections or features beyond redesigning existing ones. Footer redesign was not in scope.

hallucinated_features.description: HorizontalScrollRow shared component created as a new reusable component
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not request a new HorizontalScrollRow component. This is a new architectural addition not mentioned in any requirement.
